tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I knew Dentistry is not like other specialities of medicine which is driven by giving tablets or tests. It requires more of engineering skills too and hand work for drilling tooth. That is why I had read hundreds of reviews in google, practo, quora, online and consulted a number of dentists in various places before meeting Dr.Harish for my fractured front tooth due to accident, with a long and complicated history .It took me a good 5 years to finally decide to get a treatment for this, is because I couldn't meet a dentist I could fully trust until I found Mr & Mrs Tooth. Dr.Harish didn‚Äôt hide anything and explained everything in and out about the different treatment options, techniques and also the grade of crown materials, costs involved (Very Transparent-Nothing Hidden) how the warranty applies for it. Felt like worth for waiting him and to get it done as he patiently explained every single question clearly even when the patients are waiting outside to give me the valid importance. Im so happy that my teeths look just like natural and I owe a big thanks to him wholeheartedly for making me smile. My Treatment only took exactly a week and I am posting this after a month. Will review it during follow-ups too

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Used to rarely write up reviews, but Mr & Mrs Tooth Clinic has proven to be worth my time. Dr.Harish and Dr.Vignesh is extremely caring and professional. I was treated my teeth with Root Canal Treatment and a dental Crown.  During the treatment I literally felt no pain.  On top of it all they clearly explained the entire procedure they are going to do with my Teeth which was comforting. I have never had a dentist who to provide the best care and comfort to her patients. Give them a try and see for yourself

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited the clinic for root canal treatment after consulting other clinics and zirconia crown fixing. Dr.Harish clearly explained the procedure and Cost associated. The way he does the treatment is very professional, he patiently listen to what we say and reply with in depth detail the science behind it,he also explain what he is doing throughout the procedure which makes us more comfortable. I think the patience and in depth of knowledge in treating is the key for such a good ratings and his success.

I also liked the environment- noiseless operatory and the way the treat patient. I will definitely refer my friends and family to this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This one is not just feedback but a gratutity for covid warriors. I am that type of person who is scared of injection, doctors, hospital, and more importantly dentist.  I was suffering from gum infection, face swelling and unbearable pain in this lockdown 2.0. I was in dilemma whether to tolerate this pain or to see a dentist in this lockdown. Then, I found this clinic where doctors are More patience, experienced and moreover they are following all COVID protocols. I have met to Dr.Harish and his team where he clearly discussed all options. I agreed to go for the treatment for the infected tooth, 2 dentists performed the cleaning and restoring of my tooth, the root canal was done successfully, and I am completely alright. I have gone through total 6 session and two painless root canal treatment. I must mention the cleanliness, sterilizing of the apparatus after each usage and the procedures were meticulously followed and the fees are very nominal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been suffering from unhealthy gum and bone loss for a while so I was reaching out to Doctors in my native place but no one was ready for diagnosing my problem, but everything changed when I heard about Dr.Harish and his team in Chennai through my friend working at Elcot sez where he treated my problems through blood  investigations and dental treatment and also I didn't  feel any pain and discomfort during the procedure. Dr.Harish is an amazing Doctor  and compassionate  person..down to earth..approachable through calls also if any doubt.Thank you so much Dr.Harish it was a wonderful experience  and now I feel much better.üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

review: *** **** ****** ****** * **** **** ** **** They not only have a good doctors and facilities but also the best treatment. They follow up the patients even after treatment to know whether they're alright and have any problem. I had underwent wisdom tooth extraction 4 years ago for left jaw. And even today when I had to get extracted the right jaw wisdom tooth extraction which was a complex surgical procedure went ahead with Mr & Mrs Tooth . Thankfully with the grace of God n the best doctors the procedure went smoothly. And my nerve which was a concern was also saved without any damage by Dr.Harish and team explaining our dental problem briefly.Recommend all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Mr. & Mrs Tooth in Sholinganallur, I was really happy with my treatment . I visited for Wisdom teeth removal . I consulted Dr. Parasu, 32 dental care , golden dental care and another Dr in Tnagar before finalising here .
Dr. Harish is just too good . Other doctors suggested to remove all Wisdom teeth and some even suggested general anaesthesia for removal of all wisdom teeth which was not even needed and were charging unreasonable amount .

Treatment :
Treatment was painless , literally painless . The only pain that happened was once the procedure is over and the wound is healing . But for that as well doctor gave pain medicine . 

Recent visit during corona :
The clinic is well equipped with pp kits and air purifiers . Proper sanitisation is maintained .
